verses.text: Ix tak'vi vinhaj Job chi' icha tic:
Tato smasanil in yaelal yed' in cusk'olal tic, tz'echtaj d'a yol junoc echlab',
tecan ek'to yalil d'a yichanh yarenail sti' a' mar, yuj chi' ix in comon alej icha tic.
A Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil, ichato ix och ch'apnaj sjul-lab' d'ayin, axo svenenoal spucax d'a in nivanil. Toxo ix oymaj tas ay smay d'ayin yuuj.
¿Tocval tz'ok' nok' caltacte'al b'uru tato ay yanh nok'? ¿Tocval tz'ok' nok' mam vacax tato ay tas sk'ux nok'?
¿Mach schi'an junoc chib'il vail tato malaj yatz'amil? ¿Tocval vach' sloji saquil nok' nholob' tato malaj yatz'amil?
Icha chib'il vail malaj yatz'amil, icha chi' tas tzin chi ticnaic svab'i. Manhxalaj in gana in va'i.
Comonoc tz'el d'a sk'ol Dios yak'an tas tzin k'an d'ay. Comonoc syak' tas tzin nib'ej.
Comonoc tz'el d'a sk'ol Dios chi' in sataneli, yic tzin lajviel d'a junelnhej.
Vach'chom svab' syail yuj in yaelal yed' in cusk'olal tic, palta tzin te tzalaji, yujto svak'nhej och sley Dios yipoc in k'ool, aton Dios Axonhej Ochi.
Manhxalaj vip svab'i yic svak'an techaj in yaelal tic, ¿tasxom yuj comon pitzan into?
¿Tocval lajan stzatzil in nivanil tic icha q'uen q'ueen? ¿Tocval icha stzatzil q'uen bronce stzatzil in b'ak'chil?
Maxtzac yal in colan in b'a d'a yol vico'. Manhxa junoc mach scolvaj ved'oc.
A junoc mach ayoch d'a syaelal, vach'chom manhxa yelk'och Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil d'ay, palta smoj val tz'ak'ji snivanil sk'ol yuj eb' svach'k'ool.
Palta a ex tic ex vamigo, tonhej ix in e vach' juejeli. Lajan ex icha junoc a' eluma' stup d'a smelemal.
Ayic syak'an nhab' tat tz'aj sat a' sb'eyi calan a' yed' q'uen cheev, ma yed' q'uen sacb'acom.
Ayic tz'ulax q'uen cheev chi', stupem a' eluma' chi', axo yic tzovaj k'ak' stacjiem a'.
A eb' anima b'eyum, sb'at eb' d'a titac b'e yic sayan a' eb' yuq'uej, axo tz'aji, satcanb'at eb' d'a lum taquinh luum chi', ata' schamcan eb'.
A eb' b'eyum anima aj chonhab' Temán yed' eb' aj Sabá, say a a' eb' yojtactaxon b'aj scani,
axo yic sk'och eb' b'aj aytaxon a' chi', taquinhxo yed'tal a', toxonhej staccanq'ue sk'ol eb'.
Icha chi' eyaj d'ayin a ex tic, yujto ayic tzeyilanoch jantac in yaelal tic, tonhej tzex xivq'uei.
Palta a in tic, malaj tas tzin k'an d'ayex. Malaj tumin tzin k'an d'ayex yic tzin colchaji.
¿Tocval tzin k'an e colval yic tzin colchaj d'a yol sk'ab' jun ajk'ol d'ayin, ma d'a juntzanh eb' elk'um?
Aq'uec in k'ayb'ub'al, ol in cha vab' d'ayex. Ch'oxec och in mul chi' d'a in sat.
Malaj junoc mach spaticanel junoc pensar to vach', palta a ex tic, manhxa stzolal tas tzeyak'och d'a vib'anh.
A ex tic nab'anhej tzin e tumej, palta eyojtac to a slolonel junoc mach ayoch d'a syaelal, ay b'aj malaj jab'oc yelk'ochi.
A ex tic, syal eyak'an e suerte d'a yib'anh eb' meb'a' ob'iltac. Syalpax e chonhanel junoc eyamigo.
Ochanhec q'uelan d'a in sat, tato tonhej svesej.
Actejec eyalan juntzanh chi' d'a in patic. Comonoc tzeyojtaquejeli to yel juntzanh sval tic.
A e naani to esalvum in. A e naani to manh vojtacoc tas yel yed' tas manh yeloc.
